text: Lyudmila Alekseevna Lyadova (; 29 March 1925 – 10 March 2021) was a Russian composer and singer. In 1985, she was honored with People's Artist of the USSR. She was known for appearing in many operas and theatre shows for children. In June 2020, Lyadova was hospitalized in Moscow with COVID-19. She died from problems caused by the infection on 10 March 2021, aged 95.Умерла композитор Людмила Лядова ==References== ==Other websites== * Официальный сайт композитора * МБФ «Искусство без границ» Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian composers Category:Russian singers
title: Lyudmila Lyadova
